text:
Champions League
OL - Benfica: the canvas ignites for the victory of Gones
Olympique Lyonnais beat Benfica 3-1 on Tuesday night. A victory that has not failed to react to Twitter on Twitter ...
05 Nov 2019, 22:38 by Rafael Da Silva
For this fourth match of the Champions League, Olympique Lyonnais hosted Benfica on Tuesday night. In the obligation to win, the men of Rudi Garcia finally won 3-1 against the Eagles, taking second place in his group. A victory full of control, which confirms the renewal of Les Gones since the arrival of their new technician on the bench.
Discover the best reactions of Internet users on Twitter!




Tweets anthology:
